definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
in other words/that is to say/so/thus
to bring up/to train/to contribute to/achievements (usually of young people)
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 这些中药中就有生长于云南和贵州的茯苓。

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。
左外锋，17岁就为曼联初次登场。

sentences.english: The little child stammers in the presence of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那小阿在陌生人面前说话就结巴。

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 这位班长自打高中毕业后就入伍了。

sentences.english: This will be a document that you give to a tester.
sentences.chinese: 这样就会形成你给测试者的一个文件。

sentences.english: Now, there are some immediate bad explanations for this.
sentences.chinese: 马上就有人提出一些错漏百出的解释。

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 谁让你起得这么晚，整个赤血宫就你这个时辰才起床。

sentences.english: I cabled her, but we've been at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他打电报通知我他很快就会回来。

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: Change that arrangement and you can dramatically alter the resulting organism.
sentences.chinese: 改变这个排列你就能完全改变最后的生物体。

sentences.english: I just need some place where I can lay my head.
sentences.chinese: 只想找个地方我可以倒头就睡。

sentences.english: Other plants can't do without tanking up loads of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 其它的植物就非得饱尝充足的阳光。
没人生来就会使用筷子。

sentences.english: This is the ancient origins of the rise of Buddhism and Taoism in the pre-existing folk activities.
sentences.chinese: 这是源流古者在佛道教兴起前就有的民俗活动。

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美国的奴隶制度自南北战争后就废除了。

definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
